scripts.image:docker:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker build $(echo $(build-env dashbuilderViewerImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dashbuilderViewerImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env dashbuilderViewerImageEnv.account)/$(build-env dashbuilderViewerImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) ." --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
scripts.image:podman:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(echo $(build-env dashbuilderViewerImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dashbuilderViewerImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env dashbuilderViewerImageEnv.account)/$(build-env dashbuilderViewerImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
